name: Key Hit
description:
Oh no! It's seems like you hit your keyboard too hard! Bugs, data and more are crawling out of your keys! They're out of control and out of ctrl! Squish them all with your mashing skills! Can you beat the High Score?

A small little game for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 made in 48 hours by GoneLoot .

Music made with Boscaeoli.

CONTROLS:

Letter Keys - Smash Enemies or Hit Butterflies

Shift, Backspace, Enter - Use powerups (when you get them!)

Esc - Pause the game
